## R Markdown

```{r}
require(rgdal)
require(leaflet)
require(leaflet.extras)
require(dplyr)
require(readxl)
require(stringr)
```

# Map with a layer of points

```{r}
crimes <- read.csv("Crime_Incidents_in_the_Last_30_Days.csv")

crimes.circle.map <- leaflet(data = crimes[1:100,]) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircleMarkers(lng = ~LONGITUDE, lat = ~LATITUDE)
crimes.circle.map  # Print the map
```
# Map with a layer of lines
```{r}
crimes.line.map <- leaflet(data = crimes[1:100,]) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addPolylines(lng = ~LONGITUDE, lat = ~LATITUDE)
crimes.line.map  # Print the map
```
